section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Byron R. White

turn.speaker: william_h_rehnquist
turn.label: Chief Justice William H. Rehnquist
turn.text: The opinion of the Court in No. 86-7059, Patterson against Illinois will be announced by Justice White.

turn.speaker: byron_r_white
turn.label: Justice Byron R. White
turn.text: In this case, we affirm the judgment of the Supreme Court of Illinois.
Illinois -- Justice Blackmun has filed a dissenting opinion and has Justice Stevens who is joined by Justices Brennan and Marshall.
